notes: Owns Milwaukee and Ryobi brands. SWK's primary rival in the professional and DIY power tool markets.
Japanese manufacturer focused on high-quality professional cordless power tools and outdoor power equipment.
German multinational. Private company (no ticker). Major global player in power tools and accessories.
Diversified industrial manufacturer. Competes heavily in construction products, fasteners, and welding.
Specializes in engineered metal products. Direct competitor to SWK's aerospace fastening business.
Leader in structural connectors and building solutions. Competes with SWK's construction fastening solutions.
